name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Serhiy HUDZ, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Serhiy HUDZ, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 23rd day of February, 2012, the Petitioner’s “Emergency Petition for Early Decision on Request for Supreme Court to Hear Case of Serhiy Hudz” is DENIED. The Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
38 A.3d 821
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Serhiy HUDZ, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 23, 2012.
